verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is everyone who fears <WH3373> Yahweh, <WH3068> who walks <WH1980> in his ways. <WH1870>
For you will eat <WH398> the labor <WH3018> of your hands. <WH3709> You will be happy, <WH835> and it will be well with you. <WH2896>

Your wife <WH802> will be as a fruitful <WH6509> vine, <WH1612> in the innermost parts <WH3411> of your house; <WH1004> your children <WH1121> like olive <WH2132> plants, <WH8363> around <WH5439> your table. <WH7979>
Behold, <WH1397> thus is the man blessed <WH1288> who fears <WH3373> Yahweh. <WH3068>
May Yahweh <WH3068> bless <WH1288> you out of Zion, <WH6726> and may you see <WH7200> the good <WH2898> of Jerusalem <WH3389> all the days <WH3117> of your life. <WH2416>
Yes, <WH7200> may you see your children <WH1121>'s children. <WH1121> Peace <WH7965> be upon Israel. <WH3478>
